page.title: 15OUR VILLAGE SHOPS
page.content: { Interview Mr.Mycock Butcher One day Rachel and I went to see{Mr. {Mycock the butcher.}Sadly Mr. Mycock was out so we interviewed{Mr. Nailer {one of his}helpers. He told us that he's worked there for{39 years. We asked him what it's like to work in a butcher's shop he said, "Very pleasent." He told us that Friday is a busy day." Mr. Mycock only employs{two {people.}Mr.Nailer would not like to work as anything else. The shop opens at 7 a.m. and closes at 5.30pm.They order the meat from F.M.C. { Interview Mr. Warrwick Grocer Mr.Warrwick has served in this shop for{twenty years.}Nowadays people buy only small quantities from the village shop. Twelve years ogo they bought larger quantities. As this is a village shop I sell bits of every-thing.
